summary: Implements the Prefect command‑line interface for managing deployments, offering commands to create, update, delete, list, inspect, and run deployments, as well as to configure and manipulate their schedules and associated work pools, with utilities for formatting output and handling user input.
business_intent: Provide end‑users and operators a convenient CLI tool to control Prefect deployments and their execution schedules, enabling automated workflow orchestration, resource allocation, and operational oversight without writing code.
